passages.content:
CloudNode Systems - Scheduled Maintenance Notice

Enhance your workflow with our upcoming infrastructure upgrades. CloudNode Systems will perform critical updates to improve server stability and security within the next 48 hours.

Services Affected:
1. Database Optimization – Routine maintenance to ensure high-speed query responses. Visit status.cloudnode.com to see live performance logs.
2. API Version Updates – We are introducing new REST API endpoints. Legacy endpoints will remain active but will no longer receive security patches.
3. Security Firewall Upgrade – Our experts will implement advanced AI-driven threat detection to distinguish malicious traffic from legitimate requests.
4. Multi-Region Replication – For those with global operations, we offer synchronized data backup across three continents.

Please email (support@cloudnode.com) with your account ID and specific concerns. A technical representative will call you within 12 hours to discuss your project requirements.

To: support@cloudnode.com
From: t.sato@embedded-dev.jp
Date: October 14
Subject: Maintenance Inquiry

I found your notice on the developer portal and wish to use your regional replication services for my embedded firmware distribution business. I am looking specifically for a way to synchronize binary files for my clients in Asia and Europe, and I wonder if your current upgrade would cover this for me. Since I work with high-security firmware, I would like the data to be encrypted during the transfer. Please reach out to me at my office number between 9:00 A.M. and 6:00 P.M. JST.

Thank you,

Takashi Sato
EmbeddedDev Japan

questions.q: According to the notice, why should customers visit the status page?
questions.explanation: 文書1に「Visit status.cloudnode.com to see live performance logs（ライブパフォーマンスログを確認するために訪問してください）」とあります。

questions.q: What is suggested about CloudNode Systems?
options: It provides updates once a month.
It promotes its services on a developer portal.
It recently closed its international offices.
questions.explanation: 文書2の冒頭でSato氏が「I found your notice on the developer portal（開発者ポータルで通知を見つけました）」と述べているため、そこでの宣伝が示唆されます。

questions.q: Who most likely is Mr. Sato?
questions.explanation: 署名に「EmbeddedDev Japan」という社名があり、自分のビジネス（my... business）のためにサービスを利用したいと述べていることから、事業主である可能性が最も高いです。

questions.q: What requirement does Mr. Sato NOT mention for his data?
questions.explanation: Sato氏は地域同期（regional replication）、暗号化（encrypted）、欧州への配布については言及していますが、旧API（Legacy API）のサポートについては求めていません。

questions.q: What will Mr. Sato most likely do within 12 hours?
questions.explanation: 文書1の最後に「A representative will call you within 12 hours（担当者が12時間以内に電話します）」とあり、Sato氏も電話を待っている状態であるため、担当者との会話が予想されます。
